title: #1498 Maybe He's Just Operating A Crane
itunes:title: #1498 Maybe He's Just Operating A Crane
description:
At the top of the show, Adam and Dr. Drew continue their conversation about Gavin Newsom disappearing from the public eye, and possibly having an adverse reaction to the latest vaccine booster. Drew then complains about our current leadership thinking we can't handle the truth, and the show wraps with listener calls about immunity, COVID predictions for the future, and why you should be using birth control if you don't want to get your girlfriend pregnant.
